description: Amendments to planning permission dated 19 April 2021 (RN: 20/08120/COFUL) for variation of condition 1 of planning permission dated 29 March 2019 (RN: 17/11404/COFUL) for the demolition of existing buildings and structures and erection of new building of up to five storeys plus basement floor to provide 49 residential units (Class C3); with car and cycle parking, storage and plant rooms at basement level and landscaping to central garden and site frontages and associated works from RN: 17/11404/COFUL, namely, to vary the approved drawing numbers to amend the design of the building facade depth to reduce the depth of the brick reveal; NAMELY, alteration to plant & location of access hatches/AOV to roof including boiler flue; basement ventilation penthouse louvres added; PV panels updated to specialist design; minor amendments to main entrance doors; minor amendments to courtyard doors; location of bike stand updated to approved planning application; car lift door design updated to specialist design; bike/Bin lift lobby doors amended to specialist design; generator room door updated to specialist design; unit 4.04 layout includes L-shaped corridor to fire engineers guidance; and unit 4.04 Window amended.
